name: Mask of Madness
lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

descriptions.name: Berserk
descriptions.description: Gives 110 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but reduces your armor by 5 and silences you.  Lasts 8.0 seconds.

descriptions.name: Lifesteal
descriptions.description: Heals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt. Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
